title: Question about Expose Weakness
body:
I've been looking around the googles for a good while now and haven't been able to find the answer I am looking for about the "Expose Weakness" Mastery.

Its tooltip states:
"Damaging enemy champions causes them to take 3% more damage for your allies"

This indeed seems pretty straight forward to me, although the word 'allies' is what my issue is, does 'allies' mean only Allied Champions, or does it include minions aswell? How about self summoned allies, such as Tibbers, Yoricks ghouls, Malz's voidlings? I'm just a bit unsure of what the term 'allies' means xD

Thanks for any help people could provide me with <3

replies.body: This is a great question, as if it was allied minions it would really make minion manipulation/trading in lane very interesting. I believe it is only allied champions (and their pets).

I would be inclined to believe that it doesn't buff minions, as generally minions or monsters are stated specifically. In this context allies to me says any form of allied damage (champion exclusive) will gain 3% bonus! 
So as far as I can assume, a Tibbers/Voidling etc would do bonus damage as long as it isn't your Pet!

I would say anything that hasnt got your name tag on it

ok correction. Anything that isnt your champ. Rip the op yorick.
I don't think it's self summoned pets, but everyone else's pets should gain from it.
Yeah that would be fair enough, was just thinking if Yorick's ghouls being directly uncontrollable, they would count as allies but ergh xD its a bit on the unclear side!
If it says allies i would assume everything, since minions and summoned minions are all allies.
